Title: FBC - Bula FM
Description: Our aim is to play more music and less talk on every shows. BulaFM is a commercial radio station where we play hit music every hour, reggae every quarter past and the best remix every quarter to the hour. Bula FM caters our listeners aging from 18 to 40 years in Fiji Including outer islands and the World through live streaming. Broadcasting in fijian language

Title: FBC - Mirchi FM
Description: MirchiFM’s music is from latest releases of hindi movie songs, to ablums, hits of 80’s, 90’s and every five to the hour Mirchi plays the best of 90’s.

Title: FBC - Radio Fiji One
Description: Radio Fiji One or Domoiviti is the Fijian national network targeting largely national development Fiji wide. Broadcasting in fijian language

Title: FBC - Radio Fiji Two
Description: Reaching out to the families of Fiji and also providing a 24 hour service internationally. Yes we are there for our online listeners 24/7. Fiji’s first Hindi radio.
